uiDefinition.description: The API Key (in the form 'LettriaProKey API_Key') for this api
uiDefinition.tooltip: Provide your API Key (in the form 'LettriaProKey API_Key')

properties.description: Whether you want to automate a manual task or gain insight from multiple documents, Lettria's text analysis features are designed to find new opportunities in your data. Using the service, you can easily understand text data that is given as input to the service, using artificial intelligence and natural language processing.
